dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
C. Cortes
C. J. Burges
dcterms:description: The MNIST is a handwritten digit recognition dataset, which contains 60,000 training images and 10,000 test images. There are a total of 10 different classes in the MNIST dataset: {0, 1, 2, ..., 9}. Each image is a gray image with the size of 28 × 28.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 50,000 training images and 10,000 test images, which contains 10 different classes: Airplane, Car, Bird, Cat, Deer, Dog, Frog, Horse, Ship, Truck. Each CIFAR-10 image is a 3-channel color image with the size of 32 × 32.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
